item.title: Creative coding
item.description: Creative coding Introduction My research imperatives run along the threads of transmediation, intersemiotic translation, post-disciplinarity and the general concerns of Human Computer Interaction (HCI). Key words: big-data, data, creative-coding, emacs, interaction, machine learning, org-mode, real-time, streaming, web Mental objectives The basic elements of programming in general (logic, loops, functions, objects, classes). concepts of object-oriented programming, interactivity, interactive sound and design, connectivity and interconnection techniques and tools that can also be used in other digital forms and entertainment such as arts facilities, video games and the Web.
